body: Before we dive into the content management module, let’s have a look at what you can expect from it.
pageBody: Before we dive into the content management module, let’s have a look at what you can expect from it.
title: Introduction

body: Learn the absolute essentials of Kentico, such as basic navigation around the system, or where you can get help if needed.
pageBody: Learn the absolute essentials of Kentico, such as basic navigation around the system, or where you can get help if needed.
title: Basics of Kentico administration for Editors
displayTitle: Basics of Kentico administration for Editors

body: See what you can do about the Pages application, the most important application for content editors on Kentico websites.
pageBody: See what you can do about the Pages application, the most important application for content editors on Kentico websites.

body: See what options you have for editing the content of your pages using two different WYSIWYG editors and how you can add new structured content to your website.
pageBody: See what options you have for editing the content of your pages using two different WYSIWYG editors and how you can add new structured content to your website.

body: Let's find out what other features Pages application provides which can help you with SEO as well as vital functionalities for create content in different languages.
pageBody: Let's find out what other features Pages application provides which can help you with SEO as well as vital functionalities for create content in different languages.
displayTitle: Working with URLs and multilingual content

body: Online forms are crucial for collecting information about your visitors. See how you can work with your forms to get the most engagement.
pageBody: Online forms are crucial for collecting information about your visitors. See how you can work with your forms to get the most engagement.

body: Media libraries improve the organization of your files on the website and help you work with other editors to deliver engaging media content.
pageBody: Media libraries improve the organization of your files on the website and help you work with other editors to deliver engaging media content.
title: Media libraries

body: Workflows and versioning will make your content production process a smooth ride. Let’s learn how you can use them.
pageBody: Workflows and versioning will make your content production process a smooth ride. Let’s learn how you can use them.
